reviews.sentence: Facilities. Home away from home Value Inexpensive Service Professional Cleanliness Delightful consistently good acomadation. Good sized apartment large pool and spa comfy bed restraunt bar on site Close to everything Nothing.

Position position. Great position for exploring the CBDS and close to Flinders St Station for travelling further afield. Our apartment was surprisingly big for my son and I and had everything we needed. Check in and check out was courteous and efficient. Gym pool and spa were great clean and nicely appointed. My only complaint was the lack of ramp at front for disabled people or heavy bags. There is a lift for wheelchairs but the button to call staff did not work and a young mother with a disabled child was forced to lug his wheelchair up the stairs. But overall we had definitely stay again.

The Oaks on Market St review for a family. Our family of 5 2 adults and 3 teenage kid had a great few days this week. In town for the tennis the location was perfect we could easily use the tram or walk to the tennis venues. The facilities in the room and the pool gym spa were all very good. The breakfast buffet was a great benefit for 3 hungry teenagers and there was plenty to variety. The location as well the room fit out both were very good. the breakfast buffet and pool were additional benefits as well as the magazines. the towels were very thin that is got very soaked and heavy very quickly. the location was a free tram ride to the central of the city or close to a the river for a great walk to get access to southbank casino and tennis.
Location. Easy walk to tennis shuttle shops and sights. Pool and sauna. Staff very polite and helpful. Spa pool to cold. kitchen needed a pot there was a frypan.

Great central location in the heart of the city. Central to everything for shopping eating and sport. Great location walking distance to city mall Emporium and Central for shopping and even close walk to the Casino and Southbank restaurants Shopping walking distance to DFO Mall Emporium Central and Victoria marketsCasinoResraurant precinct of Southbank20 minute walk to MCG.

Everything you need awesome views. The location was perfect and my room clean and comfy and the staff were very friendly and helpful. The gym pool and sauna were great and the views magnificent. Great value overall and they do n’t gouge on parking fees like so many others.
Great stay. Great hotel with fabulouc city views. Clean and tidy friendly staff good gym and pool. Excellent parking rates unlike other CBD hotels that like to gouge.
Hidden Gem. Great hotel great pool recreation area.
Great value for money. The staff especially the bar staff were polite and exceptionally helpful. Love the pool and spa and it is location is perfect for walking to Southbank or into the city.
Fair. Price pool spa. Single beds pushed together Mold on ceiling Poor veiw.
loved this place everything was great except the hotel spa did nt work properly and the shower did nt have great pressure. but for the price the hotel was great for the price.

Great location Clean rooms. The hotel is smack bang in the middle of the city. Great in room facilities cook top microwave small fridgeroms were clean and staff were accommodating. An added extra I did not expect was free Foxtel usually a service that would require further payment. Gym was small but acceptable pool area was clean and tidy. Free Foxtel able to cook my own food in my room. Terrific location. 1010. close to Queen St and trams. Not far from Crown Casino Concierge could provide a warmer welcome.

Central location close to DFO transport and city. Very happy with staff they were caring and very accommodating with additional requests. View of the city comfy beds and elevators were quiet during the night. DFO stores city restaurants and Edihad stadium. Warm up the pool and spa. Muesli and healthy options for breakfast.

Highly recommend this place. My second stay here. Very spacious rooms on both occasions. Fitness facilities great though like a rabbit warren to get to. Staff excellent. Location Excellent. Private parking only 10 night exit through third party BUT only for small cars sedans 19 m clearance. Easy 5min walk to crown promenade. Walked to Crown cinemas comfortably in about 15mins. Love this place. Everything Fantastic. Nothing I can think of.
my stay at Melbourne or oaks was excellent. staff cleanliness of room gym. would have been to swim in the pool it was coldtv channels no movie channels.

Clean basic but excellent location. So near the heart of Melbourne. Close to Southgate and the river which is busy and buzzing with people. good eateries casino and riverside bars there. Not far to Bourke Street Mall and shopping heaven. Public transport also just a short walk either via tram or train from Flinders Street Station. Accommodation is clean and modern. Basic kitchenette with limited appliances no dishwasher. Very comfortable bed pillows and good block out blinds. The daily housekeeping was a bonus but we only got one small fitting shower cap in our 3 nights stay and the toiletries were not that great. Small gym approximately 15 metre pool was fantastic and there were extra towels supplied too. Good accommodation at a reasonable price. I had stay again for the price and location.

Stayed two nights for the tennis. Checked in late welcomed at midnight. Streamline check in. Our toilet was a problem. Kept filling and draining. Due to the hour I turned off the water. We reported it on the way out. My daughter got a call during the day to say the plumber would not be in and offered to change our room. We did but said to wait until we got back. No problem. Slightly larger room on the same floor so we did not have to take out luggage too far. Room was a small upgrade. But happy for the one night. Rooms comfortable and a c. Bed very comfortable after walking all day at tennis and sitting in the sun and the toilet worked. Close to station and easy walk to CBD. Oak and Vine bar comfortable after check out.

Easy location comfy stay. I had to be in Melbourne for 8 nights and opted to stay in a studio room. It had cooking facilities and was not far from a grocery chain store Fitness First and public transport. The checking in process was great. The staff member was helpful and pleasant. As a matter of fact I can not fault any of the staff that I encountered. My only gripe was that housekeeping was a little random. Some days my room was tidied up by 11 am some days it did not get done til after 330pm. As I was there for 8 nights I noticed these things. Also there was not a great deal of consistency with housekeeping. Sometimes I got two small towels and one handtowel sometimes two handtowels and no small towels. Small things but I kinda like consistency. My issue I know. My only other gripe was the TV. Whilst there was a remote only the volume up down button and the channel up down button worked. Mute did not nor did the EPG.

Fantastic hotel right in the CBD. Our room was clean modern very spacious the bathroom was also a good size the bed was very comfy. The staff were friendly welcoming the location was great close to almost everything. The Pool Spa was much needed a great space to relax. We loved that this hotel had a restaurant on site with affordable delicious lunches happy hour every night. Highly recommend. The only negative experience we had at this hotel was being woken up by the extremely loud fire alarm early one morning with no communication about what was going on until after we had frantically ran around grabbing what we could ready to evacuate only to find out 20 mins later someone burnt their toast.

Certainly better than average and great location. Clean comfortable crowded. Seemed to always be people waiting at reception and lifts anytime of the day or night. I asked for a high room on the south side as per the review recommendations. The promised “ view of the river ” may have been a little over sold but I was n’t there for the view anyway and they had been responsive so good for them. The room was large especially compared to some previous Melbourne experiences. Bed was comfortable. Shower whilst over the bath was at least high enough that even at 190 cms I did n’t have to bend over to get under the spray and no problems with water pressure or temperature both also problems during a previous Melbourne stay AVOID THE DOUBLE TREE BY HILTON. The location was outstanding surrounded by all sorts of eating options not all of which closed at 5 pm or earlier. leaving plenty to choose from for dinner. Also a range of good friendly bars nearby which was welcome. Would absolutely stay again the hotel was fine but the neighbourhood was outstanding. The only improvement would have been if the room a c thermostat was there for more than just decoration I arrived it was on 21 the room was chilly I turned it up but the room stayed at 21. That night I turned it down to facilitate sleep but the room stayed at 21. The gym and pool were both good and uncrowded so the a c was my only minor complaint.

SO1 2018. The hotel was located in easy walking distance of Southbank Docklands the MCG and AMI park which suited us for our trip to the State of Origin and Storm v Broncos games. It was very clean and comfortable and staff were very friendly and professional. The kitchenette in the room allowed us to make a leisurely breakfast before heading out for the days activities although we did use room service on one occasion and the steak was excellent. The free in room WiFi was also an added bonus.
Really good apart from the spa bath which was as warm as the pool.

All good except spa bit cool could be warmer than pool. Loved the pool and sauna. Great polSpa cold Pleasant staff Cleaning girls nice and helpful. Not enough cutlery only one knife and fork for two But I did n’t ask for more because We were out most of the time Close to all services around the city. Catch a tram almost anywhere in the CBD Pillows too soft otherwise Very central clean place and quiet to stay.

Disappointing. First off no one on Oaks chat or answering their inquiry form knows how to get the 12 parking listed on their Oaks on Market website I was told 4 different things from 4 different people. Second we booked here for 5 nights because of their location and facilities we turn up and the pool spa and sauna are all out of order very disappointing when you have a 10 year old. I was also told there was no recompense for this not even a 5 voucher. but we could walk the 90metres to their other hotel if we wanted to use this pool. Third our room phone is not working fourth our bathroom door does nt shut u less you use the lock. And last the room service food was poor for the price a 24 pizza was completely average as was the 29 fish and chips see pictures.

Lovely but disappointing. The room was wonderful and well set out. The location is brilliant and close to absolutely everything in Melbourne. Very central. However the spa not working for our entire 3 night stay when that is the reason we booked was extremely disappointing.

Melbourne to see the tennis. Our stay was okay. Firstly I could not work the microwave but the gentleman came up and showed me how to use it. The freezer in the fridge was no good as we wanted to freeze some water etc for the tennis and it took over a day to get anything. the floor was a little dirty as when you got into shower it would leave black marks. The worst part was our TV only worked 1 night on Channel 9 for us to watch the tennis. The rest of the it would flecker and then go off especially the last night which it would not go on. I rang the desk and they said it was off all over Melbourne but this was not true as our friends had it on their TV. The desk rang me to say it was back on but it definately did not come back on ours so had to go to bed and even in the morning it was not on the TV. Actually no Chanel 9s came up. We go to Melbourne to specially see the tennis so when we get back at night we like to watch and have our dinner. We were furious when it did not come on. Not Good Enough. The meal we had was okay and staff were friendly. We usually go every year. Sandy Spies.

Tired Motel good location. I tried this motel hoping it would be quieter than one i previously stayed and i was happy to find that the room was very quiet the bed comfortable and the room spacious. The Gym has all of the usual items however it was lacking cups to drink from the water dispenser. The bathroom was quite tired with a lot of mould in the tiles paint chips and dirty walls. While room was comfortable and the service good i would expect a higher level of attention to detail for motels in this price range.

Good family hotel close to central Melbourne. This hotel is only a few minutes away from the city centre and SouthBank the kitchenette is fully equipped and allows families a good place to base their stay. We had two adults and two children who had a separate bedroom overal we had a very large room. We used the pool hot tub and sauna which was very good but indoors not outdoors.

Great stay. The staff were wonderfully accommodating and upgraded our room as we arrived since we are returning guests. The room and facilities gym pool sauna etc were of very high quality. The staff were very helpful with hints and directions etc.

While it was clean and comfortable and the staff were pleasant I ’m not in a hurry to go back. The room was very clean and comfortable. This is not suitable for anyone with difficulties getting up and down stairs. The pool and gym is inconveniently in the basement with a maze of stairs. The toilets in the lobby has stairs. No ramp to the entrance. And while I appreciate being acomodate with a disabled room the bathroom is like a toilet block with the door opening in the wrong direction.

Location. Facilities. Loved that there was a bar down stairs as well as all the facilities including the pool and gym. Bargain of a price for all the facilities. The pool and gym was hard to access had to use stairs as the elevator was full with cleaning staff.
Wonderful. Large bright room Friendly staff. The spa jacuzi was cool same temperature as the pool. Construction site next door was noisey.
